long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of Asta with a dynamic and captivating theme!

🎨 Minimalist Design: Highlighting Asta’s striking blue eyes and windswept hair, embodying his determination and energy.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay sharp and on time with a display that complements Asta’s focused and vibrant aura.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Reach your favorite websites effortlessly, mirroring Asta’s relentless drive.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy thrilling mini-games inspired by Black Clover and Asta’s epic battles.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches, perfectly aligned with the theme’s dynamic visuals.
🚀 More Extensions: Power up your browsing experience with features as bold and determined as Asta himself.
